TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit MembershipUserCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class MembershipUserCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class MembershipUserCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type MembershipUserCollection = class interface IEnumerable interface ICollection

span.span: A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从类的 、和方法返回。 A is returned from the , , and methods of the class. 、和方法返回的对象包含成员资格数据存储区中用户信息的快照。 The objects returned by the , , and methods contain a snapshot of user information in the membership data store. 也就是说, 对中的成员资格用户信息所做的更改不会反映在成员资格数据存储中。That is, changes to the membership user information in a are not reflected in the membership data store. 若要修改成员资格数据存储区中的成员资格用户信息 , 请使用类的和方法。To modify membership user information in the membership data store, use the , and methods of the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 的成员资格功能, 请参阅 "[成员资格简介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100))", 然后继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表, 请参阅[使用成员身份管理用户](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回具有当前联机用户数计数的成员资格用户的列表。The following code example returns a list of membership users with a count of the number of users currently online. 有关配置为使用成员身份的 ASP.NET 应用程序的示例, 请参阅类。For an example of an ASP.NET application configured to use membership, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/ShowUserscs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/ShowUsersvb.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由属性返回的对象包含成员资格数据存储区中用户信息的快照。The object returned by property contains a snapshot of user information in the membership data store. 也就是说, 中成员资格用户信息的更改不会反映在成员资格数据存储中。That is, changes to the membership user information in the are not reflected in the membership data store. 若要修改成员资格数据存储中的成员资格用户信息, 请使用 、和方法。To modify membership user information in the membership data store, use the , , and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了中的所有成员身份用户名, 并显示了所选用户名的特定成员身份信息。The following code example displays all membership user names in a and shows specific membership information for the selected user name. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetReadOnly() cil managed

summary.span: 使成员资格用户集合的内容成为只读内容。

span.span: Makes the contents of the membership user collection read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的内容被视为只读内容, 因为它们是成员资格数据存储区中成员资格用户信息的快照。The contents of a are considered read-only, as they are a snapshot of the membership user information in the membership data store. 成员资格用户信息使用、 和方法进行修改。Membership user information is modified using the , and methods. 方法将标记为只读, 以便无法在集合中添加或移除对象。 The method marks the as read-only so that objects cannot be added to or removed from the collection. 对象的属性值未标记为只读。Property values for the objects are not marked as read-only. 也就是说, 无论集合是否已由方法标记为只读 , 都可以在中修改的属性值。That is, you can modify the property values of a in the regardless of whether the collection has been marked as read-only by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从成员资格数据存储区中返回所有用户。The following code example returns all of the users from the membership data store. 返回的根据`Boolean`调用方指定的参数标记为只读。The returned is marked as read-only based on a `Boolean` parameter specified by the caller. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/CS/snippetscs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#5)]
